message: Let's start with a fair split, then we can negotiate.
You wanted a fair split, so I'm offering a slight tilt in my favor. Will you meet me in the middle?
I'm not willing to give you a 54-32 split. I'll hold out for a better deal.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more for myself.
You wanted a bit more, so I'm giving you a smaller share. Don't expect any more charity from me!
That's not a fair deal at all! I'm not getting a good share.
I'm willing to give you most of the money, but I need to get something for myself.
You're getting desperate, so I'm taking what I want. Don't expect any mercy!
You're being ruthless! I'm not going to give you 90% of what's left.
I'm running out of options, but I'll try to squeeze out a bit more for myself.
You're almost out of options, and I'm taking the rest. Don't bother trying to negotiate further.
You're being merciless! I'm not going to accept a 99-1 split.
I'm not getting anything, so I might as well give you the rest.
